en.title: Customer Feedback
en.description: Please provide feedback on the service you received.
en.question: What is the level of satisfaction with the service provided?

en.title: Customer Recommendation
en.description: Please let us know how likely you are to recommend our company.
en.question: How do you evaluate your satisfaction an service employee performance?

en.title: Customer Rating
en.description: Your opinion matters! Rate our company from 1 to 5 stars.
en.question: Rate your happiness level in relation to Provided Service?

en.title: Contact Information
en.description: Please provide your contact information for follow-up.
en.question: How would you prefer to be contacted?

ar.title: ملاحظات العميل
ar.description: يرجى تقديم ملاحظات حول الخدمة التي تلقيتها.
ar.question: ما هو مستوى الرضا عن الخدمة المقدمة؟

ar.description: يرجى إعلامنا بمدى احتمالية أن توصي بشركتنا.

ar.title: تقييم العميل
ar.description: رأيك مهم! قم بتقييم شركتنا من 1 إلى 5 نجوم.
ar.question: قيم مستوى سعادتك بالخدمة المقدمة؟
